title: USA TODAY’s 21st Annual Save Our Shows Poll Opens for Voting
text:
CLOSE

Save Our Shows (Photo: USA TODAY LIFE)

USA TODAY launched its 21st annual Save Our Shows poll today, giving TV fans the opportunity to vote to support shows that are hovering between renewal and cancellation. Fans have a few weeks to cast their ballot for their favorite of the 30 scripted network series “on the bubble” this year.

Last year’s Save Our Shows drew a record turnout of nearly 150,000 votes, and the top pick, NBC’s Timeless, ended up being rescued from cancellation. NBC decided to bring back Timeless for a second season in the wake of fan outcry over its initial decision to drop the series.

Broadcast networks ultimately consider many factors when determining their TV lineups, but no matter the decisions of networks, USA TODAY’s Save Our Shows gives fans a prominent outlet to express their support for the TV programs that matter the most to them.

The 30 TV shows “on the bubble” this year are:

ABC

Deception

Fresh Off the Boat

For the People

Designated Survivor

Station 19

Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.

Quantico

Speechless

CBS

Fox

NBC

The Brave

Champions

Great News

Taken

Timeless

“Our readers are very passionate about TV, so each year it’s exciting to see them rally behind their favorite shows,” said Alison Maxwell, managing editor of USA TODAY’s Life section. “We are proud to offer our readers an innovative way to show the strength of their support, and we’re thrilled that our Save Our Shows campaign has had a major impact.”

Voting in USA TODAY’s 2018 poll of “on the bubble” shows is now open at sos.usatoday.com.
